  
BLOCK ELEMENTS TEST

FROM XML:
<xslTutorial>
<STYLE>this</STYLE><STYLE>rocks</STYLE>
<STYLE>this</STYLE>
<STYLE>rocks</STYLE>
<STYLE>this</STYLE>
<STYLE>rocks</STYLE>
<STYLE>this</STYLE>
<STYLE>rocks</STYLE>
<STYLEPAN>this</STYLEPAN><STYLE>rocks</STYLE>
<STYLEPAN>this</STYLEPAN>
<STYLE>rocks</STYLE>
</xslTutorial>
